TopicTitle: towns on kerbin(not the best at spelling)

Articles.Content: i think a cool thing to implement would be to have town or cities in kerbal space program 2 so that there are obsitles when you land and you can't just land in the  middle of a mountain and just let it roll down and forgeting about it. this would add an additional challenge and not just dumping boosters in the ocean. this could be a on off function.

Eh, Ask The Developers.

 

But For Now, If youre using KSP

This Mod Will Help You 

Kerbal Konstructs Needed.
